text: Marlene Font (born 7 February 1954) is a Cuban fencer. She competed at the 1976 and 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Cuban female fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Cuba Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in fencing Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Cuba Category:Fencers at the 1975 Pan American Games
title: Marlene Font
